chance.title: Advance to Illinois Ave
chance.text: Advance to Illinois Ave. - If you pass Go, collect $200

chance.title: Advance to St. Charles Place
chance.text: Advance to St. Charles Place. - If you pass Go, collect $200

chance.title: Advance token to nearest Utility
chance.text: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times the amount thrown.

chance.title: Advance token to the nearest Railroad
chance.text: Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she {he} is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

chance.title: Get out of Jail Free
chance.text: Get out of Jail Free – This card may be kept until needed, or traded/sold

chance.title: Go to Jail
chance.text: Go to Jail – Go directly to Jail – Do not pass Go, do not collect $200

chance.title: Make general repairs on all your property
chance.text: Make general repairs on all your property – For each house pay $25 – For each hotel $100

chance.title: Take a trip to Reading Railroad
chance.text: Take a trip to Reading Railroad

chance.title: Take a walk on the Boardwalk
chance.text: Take a walk on the Boardwalk – Advance token to Boardwalk

chance.title: You have been elected Chairman of the Board
chance.text: You have been elected Chairman of the Board – Pay each player $50

chance.title: You have won a crossword competition
chance.text: You have won a crossword competition - Collect $100

community.title: Bank error in your favor
community.text: Bank error in your favor - Collect $200

community.title: From sale of stock you get $50
community.text: From sale of stock you get $50

community.title: Get Out of Jail Free
community.text: Get Out of Jail Free – This card may be kept until needed or sold

community.title: Go to Jail
community.text: Go to Jail – Go directly to jail – Do not pass Go – Do not collect $200

community.title: Grand Opera Night
community.text: Grand Opera Night – Collect $50 from every player for opening night seats

community.title: It is your birthday
community.text: It is your birthday - Collect $10 from each player

community.title: You are assessed for street repairs
community.text: You are assessed for street repairs - $40 per house

community.title: You have won second prize in a beauty contest
community.text: You have won second prize in a beauty contest - Collect $10
